titleStmt.title: Exploits discovered, in a declaration of some more proceedings of Serjeant Major Chudley, generall of the forces under the Earle of Stamford: against Sir Ralph Hopton. Fully relating the great overthrow given to him. As it was sent in a letter from Exon, (Aprill 29.) to a man of note in London. Also a briefe rehersall of the severall victories, which the enemy, (to all their great discouragement), hath of late received by the Parliament forces.
titleStmt.author: H. R.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for B. Allen, and T. Underhill,

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed on p. 7: "April 29, 1643"; "H. R.".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
